name: Smile Coin
description: Smile Coin's SDK, which is live on Grin Gaming now and will be publicly available for businesses to integrate within this quarter, allows any Web2 company to become a Web3-enabled platform with the Smile Coin SDK and Smile Coin dApp. The innovative drop-in JavaScript SDK abstracts all of the complexity of the blockchain and allows gaming platforms to get paid more quickly and at a lower cost than all existing processors in the space.
